1.content:
I grew up remembering a women so dear.
The day I was born she held me so near.
She rocked me so gently so I could sleep.
She would sing to me so I would'nt weep.
This woman loved me from the very start.
I knew that her love came from her heart.

When I grew up she took care of me .
When my parents worked to provide for me.
I watched grandma cook,my favorite food.
Speggetti and Meatballs were very good.
Grandma loved cooking and she did it best.
She was the darn best cook in the west.

Grandma had a special friend.
Who would love her to the end.
She told me about this special friend
And he would also love me to the end.
This special friend she would meet someday.
When she died he would carry her away.
To be with him to his palce on high.
And told her she would not cry.

I will remember my Grandma to this very day.
Walking with her day by day.
And someday when I die I will be with her on high.
Again walking by Grandma side by side.
1.title: A Walk with Grandma

info.brief_description: Visiting grandma at her house in California
info.description: Memories of my sons Grandparents. Grandma was their pride and joy. Always at Grandmas house.Cooking their favorite meals.She made their favorite meal speggetti and meatballs. Grandma died leaving memories.
